title: "ITS amplicon protocol"
format: html
---

### PCR specifications

**Target Region and Size**: ITS 1 region (\~321 bp)

**Template Concentration**: 50 ng

**Enzyme and Master mix**: TaKaRa LA Taq (Cat. No. RR002A)

### **Primers**

| ID | Primer sequence | Length |
|------------------------|------------------------|------------------------|
| ITS1F (1723-1744) | <font color="blue">TCGTCGGCAGCGTCAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAG</font>CTTGGTCATTTAGAGGAAGTAA | 55 |
| ITS2R (2024-2043) | <font color="red">GTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAG</font>GCTGCGTTCTTCATCGATGC | 54 |

### **PCR Mixture**

| Reagents            | Concentration | 1 reaction (25 μL) |
|---------------------|---------------|--------------------|
| DNA Template        | 50 ng         | 1.7 μL             |
| 10X LA PCR Buffer   | 1X            | 2.5 μL             |
| MgCl2               | 1.8 mM        | 1.8 μL             |
| dNTPs               | 0.1 mM        | 1 μL               |
| Forward Primer      | 0.28 pmol     | 0.7 μL             |
| Reverse Primer      | 0.28 pmol     | 0.7 μL             |
| BSA                 | 0.1 μg        | 0.5 μL             |
| Nuclease Free Water | \-            | 15.975 μL          |
| Takara LA Taq       | 0.625 U       | 0.125 μL           |
| Total               | \-            | 25 μL              |

### **PCR Conditions**

| Step | Temperature           | Time                     | Cycle |
|------|-----------------------|--------------------------|-------|
| 1    | 95 °C                 | 5 minutes                | 1     |
| 2    | 95 °C → 56 °C → 72 °C | 30 sec → 30 sec → 30 sec | 32    |
| 3    | 72 °C                 | 7 minutes                | 1     |
| 4    | 20 °C                 | ∞                        | \-    |
